description: From a series of nine etchings, Das Gesicht (The Face), published by Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924; head and shoulders of a woman with a large collar and closed eyes turned to the left; background colored in teal and area around the eyes in pink
inscription: LL in plate in reverse: Sonia | LR in plate: W.G. / 23 | LL in pencil, below image: 6) | LL of sheet, in pencil: Eigendruck | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: E161 1875
portfolio: From Plate 7 from Das Gesicht (The Face), Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 23
title: Tired Girl's Head (Sonia Gramatté), Plate 7 from Das Gesicht (The Face)
